short_description: hypothesis test function to perform ftest analysis on a data set.
long_description: fastpath function to perform ftest analysis on a data set.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.description: The input table for ftest analysis.
input_tables.rDescription: The input table for ftest analysis

argument_clauses.name: FirstSampleColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the first sample column in f test
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the first sample column in f test

argument_clauses.name: SecondSampleColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the second sample column in f test
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the second sample column in f test

argument_clauses.name: SampleNameColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column containing the names of the samples included in the f test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column containing the names of the samples included in the f test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: SampleValueColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column containing the values for each sample member. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column containing the values for each sample member. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: FirstSampleName
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the first sample included in the f test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the first sample included in the f test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: SecondSampleName
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the second sample included in the f test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the second sample included in the f test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: df1
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the df of the first sample
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the df of the first sample

argument_clauses.name: df2
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the df of the second sample
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the df of the second sample

argument_clauses.name: Alpha
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the value of alpha in hypothesis function
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the value of alpha in hypothesis function
